verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

קַדֶּשׁ־ <S%H6942><s%> kad-desh- Sanctify לִ֨י li כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol every בְּכ֜וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor unto me all the firstborn פֶּ֤טֶר <S%H6363><s%> Pe-ter whatsoever openeth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of every רֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H7358><s%> re-chem the womb בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> biv-Nei among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בָּאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ba-'a-Dam [both] of man וּבַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> u-vab-be-he-Mah; and of beast לִ֖י li הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, unto the people זָכ֞וֹר <S%H2142><s%> za-Chor Remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom day הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְצָאתֶ֤ם <S%H3318><s%> ye-tza-Tem in which ye came out מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim from Egypt מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit out of the house עֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim, of bondage כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki by בְּחֹ֣זֶק <S%H2392><s%> be-Cho-zek for by strength יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> Yad, of hand הוֹצִ֧יא <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tzi brought you out יְהֹוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh; this וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and nothing יֵאָכֵ֖ל <S%H398><s%> ye-'a-Chel be eaten חָמֵֽץ׃ <S%H2557><s%> cha-Metz. from this [place] there shall no leavened bread

הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom This day אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you יֹצְאִ֑ים <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'Im; came ye out בְּחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> be-Cho-desh in the month הָאָבִֽיב׃ <S%H24><s%> ha-'a-Viv. Abib

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> chi- shall be when יְבִֽיאֲךָ֣ <S%H935><s%> ye-vi-'a-Cha shall bring יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And it shall be when the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz thee into the land הַֽ֠כְּנַעֲנִי <S%H3669><s%> Hak-ke-na-'a-ni of the Canaanites וְהַחִתִּ֨י <S%H2850><s%> ve-ha-chit-Ti and the Hittites וְהָאֱמֹרִ֜י <S%H567><s%> ve-ha-'e-mo-Ri and the Amorites וְהַחִוִּ֣י <S%H2340><s%> ve-ha-chiv-Vi and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֗י <S%H2983><s%> ve-hay-vu-Si, and the Jebusites אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha unto thy fathers לָ֣תֶת <S%H5414><s%> La-tet to give לָ֔ךְ Lach, אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz thee a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> za-Vat flowing חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash; and honey וְעָבַדְתָּ֛ <S%H5647><s%> ve-'a-vad-Ta that thou shalt keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֲבֹדָ֥ה <S%H5656><s%> ha-'a-vo-Dah this service הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh in this month הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At Seven יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days תֹּאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> to-Chal thou shalt eat מַצֹּ֑ת <S%H4682><s%> matz-Tzot; unleavened bread וּבַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> u-vai-yOm day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, and in the seventh חַ֖ג <S%H2282><s%> chag [shall be] a feast לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. to the LORD

מַצּוֹת֙ <S%H4682><s%> matz-tzOt Unleavened bread יֵֽאָכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> ye-'a-Chel, shall be eaten אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim; days וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and nothing יֵרָאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> ye-ra-'Eh be seen לְךָ֜ le-Cha חָמֵ֗ץ <S%H2557><s%> cha-Metz, and there shall no leavened bread וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor יֵרָאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> ye-ra-'Eh seen לְךָ֛ le-Cha שְׂאֹ֖ר <S%H7603><s%> se-'Or with thee neither shall there be leaven בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all גְּבֻלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Le-cha. with thee in all thy quarters

וְהִגַּדְתָּ֣ <S%H5046><s%> ve-hig-gad-Ta And thou shalt shew לְבִנְךָ֔ <S%H1121><s%> le-vin-Cha, thy son בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom in that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying בַּעֲב֣וּר <S%H5668><s%> ba-'a-Vur [This is done] because of זֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh, that עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah did יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [which] the LORD לִ֔י Li, בְּצֵאתִ֖י <S%H3318><s%> be-tze-Ti unto me when I came forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. out of Egypt

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall serve לְךָ֨ le-Cha לְא֜וֹת <S%H226><s%> le-'ot And it shall be for a sign עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto יָדְךָ֗ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha, unto thee upon thine hand וּלְזִכָּרוֹן֙ <S%H2146><s%> u-le-zik-ka-rOn and for a memorial בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> bein among עֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha, between thine eyes לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an, and it תִּהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh shall serve תּוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> to-Rat law יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD'S בְּפִ֑יךָ <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi-cha; may be in thy mouth כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בְּיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad hand חֲזָקָ֔ה <S%H2389><s%> cha-za-Kah, for with a strong הוֹצִֽאֲךָ֥ <S%H3318><s%> ho-tzi-'a-Cha brought thee out יְהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh hath the LORD מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֛ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-mar-Ta Thou shalt therefore keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֻקָּ֥ה <S%H2708><s%> ha-chuk-Kah this ordinance הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot its לְמוֹעֲדָ֑הּ <S%H4150><s%> le-mo-'a-Dah; in his season מִיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> mi-ya-Mim from year יָמִֽימָה׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mi-mah. to year ס sa-Mek

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- now when יְבִֽאֲךָ֤ <S%H935><s%> ye-vi-'a-Cha shall bring יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And it shall be when the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz thee into the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni, of the Canaanites כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' as he sware לְךָ֖ le-Cha וְלַֽאֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> ve-la-'a-vo-Tei-cha; unto thee and to thy fathers וּנְתָנָ֖הּ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-ta-Nah and shall give לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וְהַעֲבַרְתָּ֥ <S%H5674><s%> ve-ha-'a-var-Ta That thou shalt set apart כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol of every פֶּֽטֶר־ <S%H6363><s%> pe-ter- all that openeth רֶ֖חֶם <S%H7358><s%> Re-chem the matrix לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol of every פֶּ֣טֶר׀ <S%H6363><s%> Pe-ter and every firstling שֶׁ֣גֶר <S%H7698><s%> She-ger that cometh בְּהֵמָ֗ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah, of a beast אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh own לְךָ֛ le-Cha הַזְּכָרִ֖ים <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim which thou hast the males לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. [shall be] the LORD'S

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol every פֶּ֤טֶר <S%H6363><s%> Pe-ter And every firstling חֲמֹר֙ <S%H2543><s%> cha-Mor of an ass תִּפְדֶּ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> tif-Deh thou shalt redeem בְשֶׂ֔ה <S%H7716><s%> ve-Seh, with a lamb וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תִפְדֶּ֖ה <S%H6299><s%> tif-Deh and if thou wilt not redeem וַעֲרַפְתּ֑וֹ <S%H6202><s%> va-'a-raf-To; it then thou shalt break his neck וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and every בְּכ֥וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor and all the firstborn אָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man בְּבָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> be-va-Nei-cha among thy children תִּפְדֶּֽה׃ <S%H6299><s%> tif-Deh. shalt thou redeem

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- shall be when יִשְׁאָלְךָ֥ <S%H7592><s%> yish-'a-le-Cha asketh בִנְךָ֛ <S%H1121><s%> vin-Cha And it shall be when thy son מָחָ֖ר <S%H4279><s%> ma-Char thee in time to come לֵאמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What זֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> Zot; likewise וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta What [is] this;that thou shalt say אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him בְּחֹ֣זֶק <S%H2392><s%> be-Cho-zek unto him By strength יָ֗ד <S%H3027><s%> Yad, of hand הוֹצִיאָ֧נוּ <S%H3318><s%> ho-tzi-'A-nu brought us out יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim from Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim. of bondage

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when הִקְשָׁ֣ה <S%H7185><s%> hik-Shah would hardly פַרְעֹה֮ <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh And it came to pass when Pharaoh לְשַׁלְּחֵנוּ֒ <S%H7971><s%> le-shal-le-che-Nu let us go וַיַּהֲרֹ֨ג <S%H2026><s%> vai-ya-ha-Rog slew יְהֹוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every בְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> be-chOr all the firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt מִבְּכֹ֥ר <S%H1060><s%> mib-be-Chor both the firstborn אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor and the firstborn בְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah; of beast עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּן֩ <S%H3651><s%> ken after that אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I זֹבֵ֜חַ <S%H2076><s%> zo-Ve-ach therefore I sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh to the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of every פֶּ֤טֶר <S%H6363><s%> Pe-ter all that openeth רֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H7358><s%> re-chem the matrix הַזְּכָרִ֔ים <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim, being males וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol every בְּכ֥וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor but all the firstborn בָּנַ֖י <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nai of my children אֶפְדֶּֽה׃ <S%H6299><s%> 'ef-Deh. I redeem

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall serve לְאוֹת֙ <S%H226><s%> le-'Ot And it shall be for a token עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יָ֣דְכָ֔ה <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Chah, upon thine hand וּלְטוֹטָפֹ֖ת <S%H2903><s%> u-le-to-ta-Fot and for frontlets בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> bein among עֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha; between thine eyes כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki with בְּחֹ֣זֶק <S%H2392><s%> be-Cho-zek for by strength יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> Yad, of hand הוֹצִיאָ֥נוּ <S%H3318><s%> ho-tzi-'A-nu brought us forth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. out of Egypt ס sa-Mek
